005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IUuidItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.UUID;
017import java.util.regex.Pattern;
018
019import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023public class UuidAdapter
024    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<UUID, IUuidItem> {
025  @NonNull
026  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
027      List.of(new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "uuid")));
028  public static final Pattern UUID_PATTERN
029      = Pattern.compile("^[0-9A-Fa-f]{8}-[0-9A-Fa-f]{4}-[45][0-9A-Fa-f]{3}-[89ABab][0-9A-Fa-f]{3}-[0-9A-Fa-f]{12}$");
030
031  UuidAdapter() {
032    super(UUID.class);
033  }
034
035  @Override
036  public List<QName> getNames() {
037    return NAMES;
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
042    return JsonFormatTypes.STRING;
043  }
044
045  @SuppressWarnings("null")
046  @Override
047  public UUID parse(String value) {
048    return UUID.fromString(value);
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public UUID copy(Object obj) {
053    // a UUID is immutable
054    return (UUID) obj;
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public Class<IUuidItem> getItemClass() {
059    return IUuidItem.class;
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public IUuidItem newItem(Object value) {
064    UUID item = toValue(value);
065    return IUuidItem.valueOf(item);
066  }
067}
